system.description:
Playing a chart topper emotional rock song can be advantageous to the skumdog party or downright painful to listen to for baddies. The Noise Thrasher can choose one:

  • Heals an Ally for [[/roll 1D4]]+Noise Thrasher’s Level of lost HP.

  • Deals [[/roll 1D4]]+Noise Thrasher’s Level to target creature within range.

Note: Does NOT require a Spell Check for damage, only healing
